title: Jefferson on reaction to Jay Treaty - effect

content.prompt: Which of the following was an important consequence of the debate over the Jay Treaty?

choices.label: The United States adopted a policy of isolationism.
Sectional tensions between the West and the South increased.
Federalists introduced legislation in Congress to establish a constitutional monarchy on the British model.
Strong disagreements over policy promoted the development of political parties.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
